name: Best Bug Brawl
description:
Be the BEST BUG and exterminate the Evil virus! Join over millions of players who are already playing this 5-star rated addictive FREE PVP adventure! Roll and blast in the cute splashing world , collect tons of cute characters, showdown with real human opponents and save the world of Wakapapa from the evil Viruses.

* SUPPER ADDICATIVE REAL-TIME CUTE PVPs.
* UNSTOPPABLE FUN in bugs killing battles with casual levels that are easy to play but hard to master!
* COLLECT CUTE CHARACTERS Build a team, level them up, and discover their special and splashing powers!
* COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FACEBOOK FRIENDS Earn massive rewards!
* EXPLORE A WORLD ON YOUR MOBILE Immerse yourself in dazzling graphics and finger-tapping music!
* DISCOVER FEATURE-FILM QUALITY ANIMATIONS Watch amazing content!
* STAY TUNED Lookout for quality updates bringing new levels, characters, and surprises!

STORY:
The little creatures of buggie lived in peace and harmony until the meteor smashed into Mount Wakapapa, bringing with it a strange force that transformed the Peeper who lived there into an army of greedy, purper monsters. Now, the Purperlord is taking over the world, munching a path through Pupu and darkening everything they touch!

But a brave band of heroes is fighting back! Left alone when the Peeper conquered most of Wakapapa, these unlikely champions are on an epic quest to solve the mystery of Mount Wakapapa and beat back the Peeper advance.

To get to Mount Wakapapa, they’ll need to become… the BEST bug! Let's fight!

PLEASE NOTE! Best Bug Brawl is completely free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
